Reviews.Title: “Acceptable”
Reviews.Author: enbralva
Reviews.Content: hotel mondial berlin kurfürstendamm prestigious address berlin situated hotel looks view little bit fashioned fine ive separated beds ok warmly recommend contacts paid approx 75 eur night deal berlin breakfast acceptable havent tried hotels believe hotel mondial ok people seeking hotel standard moderate price

Reviews.Title: “very good”
Reviews.Author: oanach
Reviews.Content: berlin mitte hotel positioned centre strasse wide street shops conditions except summer dont otherwise worth try lots cheap restaurants cafe

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: Jack2502
Reviews.Content: hotel kudam uhlandstrasse ubahn station easy access transport system excellent location short walk zoologischer garten rail station fast link schoenefeld airport hotel wellfurnished comfortable standards housekeeping reception breakfast buffet fairly extensive visit hot food lukewarm items day werent replaced hour breakfast staff friendly helpful restaurant looked quiet evenings ate choice nearby ive stayed stay

Reviews.Title: “Well priced connecting room - a boon for families”
Reviews.Author: Wibbering
Reviews.Content: extensive research hotels berlin family difficulty finding hotel provide family conecting decent price found mondial berlins cheap connecting price listed family actually separate connecting buffet breakfast included price swimming pool albeit chilly excellent choice families kudamm grander wed hoped oh free wifi

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, central location”
Reviews.Author: twinklestar2307
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel business nice vew front wonder sleeping didnt hear nice spacious bathroom usual toiletries restaurant seats outside waiter bit stroppy menu breakfast buffet filling location pickedup tour bus outside hotel notice ladies black eyes bit worse wear cosmetic clinic site hotel recovery stay

Reviews.Title: “A hotel with a sense of class”
Reviews.Author: Gary488
Reviews.Content: mondial wonderful hotel main shopping street berlin worldly charm decorated accordingly im furnishings original feeling imagine breakfast included price europe shops metro close loved appreciate

Reviews.Title: “very nice”
Reviews.Author: hhsol
Reviews.Content: 4 ppl 2 kids baby 2 connecting food bar nice pool clean cool parking 125 day wifi free stand light touchup shower
